ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild question (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope no duels or other shenanigans.  He was able to invite me as a regular member just not as an officer, so it wasn t that npc thing, which I have seen.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Nope no duels or other shenanigans. He was able to invite me as a regular
member just not as an officer, so it wasn't that npc thing, which I have
seen. I did try going to the desktop, no luck. Another great mystery of
Verant coding it appears.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 10:51 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Guild question (OT)


Kit,

Did you, or had you, duel in that zone? Did you try logging out and back
into the game? If you were in a duel that will sometimes cause your client
to act oddly. Sometimes being charmed or feared will do it too. Basically
the client thinks you're an NPC (or gets messed up in other ways. Kinda
like the group bugs we hit from time to time).

At any rate, try logging out and back in if that happens. That SHOULD fix
it (all the way to windows, not just to char select).

CIAO!!!

Kev
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 12:23 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild question (OT)


> We tried both. He would target me and still use my name in the command.
> That format worked to make the other three members into officers, only I
was
> unable to be added. Kitasi is a founding officer already, its my wizard
> Leagnomo that's unable to become an officer strangely. Maybe its names
> ending in o...
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Danny Craigg [mailto:danny@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 10:28 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Guild question (OT)
>
>
> >I had an unusual thing happen last nite. Our guild leader was trying to
> >make my wizard an officer in the guild and could not.
>
> Was he targetting you an issuing /guildinvite o, or were you just in the
> same zone with him typing out /guildinvite o kitari?
>
> About 90% of the time, I can just use the individual's name from anywhere
in
> the zone, but the other 10% of the time I actually have to target them.
>
> Raiel
>
>
>
